p: Senior university students majoring in clinical medicine, nursing, and public health were eligible to participate in this study. The participants were restricted to those who had one more year to finish their undergraduate studies: year four in clinical medicine and public health; and, year three in nursing. These students had already completed all required coursework and were ready for the final year practice placements. Their completed coursework usually contained two parts: half in relation to basic biomedicine subjects and half in relation to clinical/professional subjects [ 28].
